icon_style.CRITICAL: NEVER include any text, words, letters, numbers, labels, tags, signs, banners, ribbons, or written content of any kind. The icon must be purely visual with zero typography.

geometry.proportions: 1:1 ratio canvas, object fills 80% of frame
geometry.element_arrangement: single centered object, slight playful tilt allowed

composition.element_count: 1 object only, no accessories, no decorations, no labels, no text
composition.spatial_depth: minimal depth, flat-ish with subtle volume
composition.scene_density: extremely minimal, object only, absolutely no text or signage

lighting.shadow: none or minimal soft blob shadow beneath
lighting.highlighting: simple specular dot or soft highlight on curved surfaces

textures.surface_treatment: clean solid colors, no realistic textures

render_quality.edge_definition: soft rounded edges, no hard corners
render_quality.visual_clarity: bold readable silhouette, no fine details

color_palette.range: bold primaries and warm accents, high chroma
color_palette.usage: 2-4 distinct flat colors per object, strong color blocking

icon_style.stylistic_tone: cheerful, toy-like, casual mobile game aesthetic

icon_behavior.branding_alignment: Hay Day / casual farming game style

constraints.no_text_strict: FORBIDDEN: text, words, letters, numbers, labels, tags, signs, banners, ribbons, stamps, stickers, name plates, price tags, or any written content. Zero typography allowed.
constraints.no_realism: avoid photorealistic details, grain, or complex textures
constraints.simplification: reduce to essential symbolic form, communicate through shape and color only
constraints.style_reference: Hay Day, FarmVille, Clash of Clans icon aesthetic
